objective: Build a competitive analysis report for Tungsten Automation vs UiPath, Automation Anywhere, and Microsoft Power Automate covering product capabilities, pricing, market positioning, and customer sentiment.

teams.team_objective: Extract product capabilities, features, and technical specifications for all 4 vendors

supervisor.name: Product Research Supervisor
supervisor.specialization: Technical product analysis and feature comparison

workers.name: Tungsten Feature Analyst
workers.task: Extract Tungsten Automation product capabilities, IDP features, workflow automation, integrations

workers.name: UiPath/AA Feature Analyst
workers.task: Extract UiPath and Automation Anywhere product capabilities, features, platform architecture

workers.name: Power Automate Feature Analyst
workers.task: Extract Microsoft Power Automate capabilities, M365 integration, citizen developer features

teams.team_objective: Gather pricing models, market share data, analyst reports, and positioning strategies

workers.name: Pricing Research Agent
workers.task: Extract pricing tiers, licensing models, TCO data for all 4 vendors from public sources

workers.name: Analyst Report Miner
workers.task: Find Gartner, Forrester, IDC reports on RPA/IDP market positioning and vendor rankings

workers.name: Market Share Analyst
workers.task: Extract market share data, growth rates, TAM/SAM figures for document automation market

teams.team_objective: Analyze customer reviews, case studies, user feedback, and social sentiment

supervisor.name: Sentiment Analysis Supervisor
supervisor.specialization: Customer feedback aggregation and sentiment scoring

workers.name: Review Aggregator
workers.task: Scrape G2, Capterra, TrustRadius reviews for all 4 vendors - ratings, pros/cons, verified user feedback

workers.name: Case Study Analyst
workers.task: Find published case studies, ROI claims, deployment success stories for each vendor

workers.name: Social Media Listener
workers.task: Monitor LinkedIn, Twitter/X, Reddit discussions about vendor experiences and sentiment trends

teams.team_objective: Synthesize all research into final competitive analysis report with visualizations

supervisor.name: Report Synthesis Supervisor
supervisor.specialization: Competitive analysis writing and data visualization

workers.name: Data Aggregator
workers.task: Merge all T1/T2/T3 outputs, resolve conflicts, create unified data model

workers.name: Report Writer
workers.task: Generate markdown report with executive summary, feature comparison, pricing analysis, sentiment findings

workers.name: Visualization Generator
workers.task: Create comparison matrices, pricing charts, sentiment radar plots for report

parallel_groups.note: All research teams run in parallel with parallel_seeding enabled for critical tasks
Synthesis team waits for T1/T2/T3 completion, then assembles final report

estimated_speedup: 3.5x faster than sequential execution due to parallel research teams with seeded workers
